properties.description: Controls the base color of the material.
properties.usageNotes: Represents the main color of the material. Alpha channel controls transparency.

properties.description: Base color texture map.
properties.usageNotes: Texture that defines the color variations across the surface.

properties.description: Controls the metalness of the material.
properties.usageNotes: 0 means non-metal, 1 means full metal.

properties.description: Controls the smoothness of the material.
properties.usageNotes: 1 means full smooth, 0 means rough.

properties.description: Controls the roughness of the material.
properties.usageNotes: 1 means very rough, 0 means very smooth.

properties.description: Controls the color of specular highlights.
properties.usageNotes: Defines the color of the material's highlights.

properties.description: Specular highlight texture map.
properties.usageNotes: Texture that defines the specular intensity across the surface.

properties.description: Normal map texture for surface details.
properties.usageNotes: Texture that defines surface detail and bumpiness.

properties.description: Controls the intensity of the normal map effect.
properties.usageNotes: Controls how pronounced the surface details appear.

properties.description: Controls the emission color of the material.
properties.usageNotes: Defines the color of the material's glow effect.

properties.description: Emission texture map.
properties.usageNotes: Texture that defines where emission appears on the surface.

properties.description: Controls the color of the rim lighting effect.
properties.usageNotes: Defines the color of the edge highlight effect.

properties.description: Controls the size of the rim lighting effect.
properties.usageNotes: Controls how wide the edge highlight appears.

properties.description: Controls the color of the outline.
properties.usageNotes: Defines the color of the object's outline.

properties.description: Controls the thickness of the outline.
properties.usageNotes: Controls how thick the outline appears.

properties.description: Controls the cel shading style.
properties.usageNotes: Determines the type of cel shading effect to use.

properties.description: Controls the color of light transmission.
properties.usageNotes: Defines the color of light passing through the material.

properties.description: Controls the alpha cutoff threshold for transparency.
properties.usageNotes: Determines the threshold at which pixels are considered transparent. 0 means fully transparent, 1 means fully opaque.

properties.description: Controls the threshold for cel shading ramp.
properties.usageNotes: Determines where the light-to-dark transition occurs in the cel shading effect.

properties.description: Controls the smoothing of cel shading ramp.
properties.usageNotes: Determines how gradual the transition between light and dark areas is in cel shading.

properties.description: Controls the number of bands in cel shading.
properties.usageNotes: Determines how many distinct light levels to show in the cel shading effect.

properties.description: Controls the smoothing between bands in cel shading.
properties.usageNotes: Determines how gradual the transitions between bands are in cel shading.

properties.description: Controls the color of shadows.
properties.usageNotes: Defines the color of the material's shadow areas.

properties.description: Shadow texture map.
properties.usageNotes: Texture that defines variations in shadow color across the surface.

properties.description: Controls the size of specular highlights.
properties.usageNotes: Determines how large the specular highlights appear on the surface.

properties.description: Controls the smoothness of specular highlights.
properties.usageNotes: Determines how gradual the edges of specular highlights are.

properties.description: Controls the roughness of specular highlights.
properties.usageNotes: Determines how spread out the specular highlights appear.

properties.description: Controls the maximum intensity of rim lighting.
properties.usageNotes: Determines the brightest possible intensity of the rim lighting effect.

properties.description: Controls whether to use light-based masking for rim lighting.
properties.usageNotes: When enabled, rim lighting is affected by light direction and intensity.

properties.description: Controls the color of matcap effect.
properties.usageNotes: Defines the color of the matcap overlay effect.

properties.description: Matcap texture map.
properties.usageNotes: Texture that defines the matcap effect across the surface.

properties.description: Controls whether to use a mask for matcap effect.
properties.usageNotes: When enabled, matcap effect can be masked using a texture.

properties.description: Matcap mask texture.
properties.usageNotes: Texture that defines where the matcap effect appears on the surface.

properties.description: Controls the color of reflections.
properties.usageNotes: Defines the color of the material's reflections.

properties.description: Controls the smoothness of reflections.
properties.usageNotes: Determines how clear or blurred the reflections appear.

properties.description: Controls the minimum value for Fresnel effect.
properties.usageNotes: Determines the lowest intensity of the Fresnel effect.

properties.description: Controls the maximum value for Fresnel effect.
properties.usageNotes: Determines the highest intensity of the Fresnel effect.
